com.thoughtworks.go.plugin.api.material.packagerepository
Interface PackageMaterialProvider

public interface PackageMaterialProvider

PackageMaterialProvider class is the staring point for package repository as material plugin. It provides PackageMaterialConfiguration and PackageMaterialPoller which are two essential parts of package repository as material plugin

Method Summary
 PackageMaterialConfiguration getConfig()
          Gets an instance of PackageMaterialConfiguration which provides configuration for package repository as material.
 PackageMaterialPoller getPoller()
          Gets an instance of PackageMaterialPoller which communicates with package repository.
